{"id":988395291,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1688714753,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/988395291/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        if(!s.size()) {\n            return 0;\n        }\n        \n        unordered_map<char, int> indexForChar;\n        \n        int start = 0;\n        int maxLen = 0;\n\n        for(int end = 0; end < s.size(); end++) {\n            char currentChar = s[end];\n\n            //if found\n            if(indexForChar.count(currentChar)) {\n                start = max(start, indexForChar[currentChar] + 1);\n            }\n\n            maxLen = max(maxLen, end - start + 1);\n            indexForChar[currentChar] = end;\n            \n        }\n        return maxLen;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
